title: Cards for Sale - T205 Clarke & More

posts.post_title: Cards for Sale - T205 Clarke & More
posts.post_content:
Selling of a small part of my collection starting with these guys.  Paypal is preferred but open to other methods of payment.  Prices include shipping.  

PM or email me at [url]poorlydrawncat@gmail.com[/url].  Always open to questions!

<iframe class="imgur-album" width="100%" height="550" frameborder="0" src="http://imgur.com/a/Ul9SD/embed"></iframe>

E98 Cy Young (possible scrap/missing color run) SGC A - $390
